item.title: [RS2] Tokul Gem Buyer [For those who use BumTokel]
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

I collected 5k Tokel with my BumTokel, and bought a ton of gems using this.

Saphires cost 38 Tokuls, Emeralds cost 76, and they respawn quickly at the tokel gem shop. You can use this to buy them. Just open the shop window and start it. Good way to make rings and amulets & leve crafting from using Bum Tokel.

program GemBuyer;
{.Include SSI2.Txt }
var
saphire,emerald: boolean;

Procedure Setup;
Begin
//Saphires: 38 Tokul, Emerald: 76 Tokul
Saphire:=True //Buy/True, Dont Buy/False
Emerald:=True //Buy/True, Dont Buy/False
End;

Procedure BuyGems;
Begin
If Saphire=True Then
 Begin
  MMouse(141,133,5,5)
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  GetMousePos(x,y)
  ClickMouse(x,y,False)
  Wait(10+Random(20))
  MoveMouseSmooth(142+Random(30)-Random(30),Y+69+Random(4))
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  GetMousePos(x,y)
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  ClickMouse(x,y,true)
  MMouse(200,200,120,120)
  Wait(50+Random(50))
 End;
If Emerald=True Then
 Begin
  MMouse(189,133,5,5)
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  GetMousePos(x,y)
  ClickMouse(x,y,False)
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  MoveMouseSmooth(189+Random(30)-Random(30),Y+69+Random(4))
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  GetMousePos(x,y)
  Wait(200+Random(200))
  ClickMouse(x,y,true)
  MMouse(200,200,120,120)
  Wait(50+Random(50))
 End;
End;

Procedure GemCheck;
Begin
 If Not FindColorTolerance(x,y,65535,124,112,133,125,5) Then
  Begin
   Wait(300+Random(300))
   BuyGems;
  End;
End;

begin
Setup;
 Repeat
  GemCheck;
  Wait(400+Random(200))
 Until(false)
end.

Read full topic
item.source: [RS2] Tokul Gem Buyer [For those who use BumTokel]
